## Properties

| Property     | Attribute    | Description                                                      | Type      | Default |
| ------------ | ------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `responsive` | `responsive` | Allows the table to be scrolled horizontally if it does not fit. | `boolean` | `false` |
